data.description_html:
This spell allows you to melt ice and snow or deal damage to cold creatures.
You can melt ice or snow as specified above, with no saving throw or spell resistance applicable.
Targeted cold creatures take 2 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10 points), half with a successful saving throw.
A creature's spell resistance applies.
Material Component: A few crystals of rock salt and a pinch of soot.
data.name: Melt
data.target: A 5-ft. cube of ice or a 10-ft. cube of snow/level, or one cold creature/level
